root.description: Zombie Tycoon 2: Brainhov's Revenge is a RTS game for the PS3 and the PSVita.The game pits two mad scientists against each other over the invasion of Finkleville. Both of the nemesis have a zombie army to do their bidding. Orville Tycoon leads his legion of green slow-moving, hulking zombies while his former boss Archibald Brainhov is the brain behind the horde of fast and furious blue zombies.GameplayThe players get to control an army of zombies invading the town of Finkleville. The game mechanics include capturing buildings, transforming zombies into different zombie types best suited for the combat and controlling a monster unit which levels up and unlocks four abilities to use in battle.The game includes a single-player campaign mode and a head-to-head multiplayer mode.Zombie typesYou can transform your basic zombies into six different zombie types by capturing specific buildings on the battlefield. Once these are in your control, you send your squads in the structures and apply the transformation. A zombie squad can only have one type at a time.
